comment._content: Judge Frederick Collin (b. 1850), served on the Court of Appeals of the State of New York from 1910-1921: www.usgennet.org/usa/ny/state/his/bio/pt22.html

comment._content: pennylrichardsca and Wystan:  Thanks for pointing us to his full name and the date on the neg.  We'll add these to the description next time we update.
